Articles.Title: Danny Masterson Found Guilty of Rape, That 70s Show Star Faces 30 Years in Prison
Articles.Description: A verdict has been reached in That 70s Show star Danny Masterson’s rape retrial, with the jury finding the actor guilty on the majority of the three counts. Deadline has reported that Danny Masterson is facing 30 years in prison as a result of being found gui…
